00017                                                                    PortMapsModel* portMapsModel,
00018                                                                    QObject *parent ):

00030 void LogicalListModel::setAbsType( const VLNV& vlnv, General::InterfaceMode mode ) {
00031 
00032         absTypeVLNV_ = vlnv;
00033         
00034         // update the mode
00035         mode_ = mode;
00036 
00037         if (!vlnv.isValid()) {
00038                 beginResetModel();
00039                 PortListModel::list_.clear();
00040                 endResetModel();
00041                 return;
00042         }
00043 
00044         // ask library to parse the model for abstraction definition
00045         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComb;
00046         if (libHandler_->contains(vlnv)) 
00047                 libComb = libHandler_->getModel(vlnv);
00048 
00049         // if library did not contain the vlnv
00050         else
00051                 return;
00052 
00053         // make sure the model is for abstraction definition
00054         QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absdef;
00055         if (libComb->getVlnv()->getType() == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION)
00056                 absdef = libComb.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
00057 
00058         // if model was some other type then free memory and exit
00059         else {
00060                 return;
00061         }
00062 
00063         // ask the abstraction definition for list of the port names
00064         QStringList portNames = absdef->getPortNames(mode_);
00065 
00066         beginResetModel();
00067 
00068         list_.clear();
00069 
00070         foreach (QString portName, portNames) {
00071 
00072                 // if the port is not yet in the list
00073                 if (!PortListModel::list_.contains(portName))
00074                         PortListModel::list_.append(portName);
00075         }
00076 
00077         endResetModel();
00078 }
00079 
00080 void LogicalListModel::refresh() {
00081 
00082         setAbsType(absTypeVLNV_, mode_);
00083 }
